    Description

    An option for enabling or disabling the default exception mapper.
    static final Options<Threshold>
    Options.ENTITY_FILE_THRESHOLD
    An option for the threshold of the EntityOutputStream to write to a file.
    static final Options<Threshold>
    Options.ENTITY_MEMORY_THRESHOLD
    An option for the threshold of the EntityOutputStream.
    static final Options<Path>
    Options.ENTITY_TMP_DIR
    An option used to override the temporary directory where entities that exceed the ENTITY_MEMORY_THRESHOLD are stored.
    static final Options<Integer>
    Options.SSE_CLOSED_RESPONSE_CODE
    An option which allows which HTTP status code should be sent when the SseEventSink.close() is invoked.
